overview: It's hard to predict when disaster will strike â€¦ but it's not hard to prepare for it when it does! This helpful guide offers a wealth of information on how to prepare for the worst. Taking the popular "Dummies" patented easy-to-follow approach -- which, as the brand name suggests, even the most clueless should be able to follow -- this is a great way for viewers to make their lives less susceptible to disaster if, and when, it strikes.
title: Disaster Preparedness for Dummies
